_header: Harkeneth hitherward beth still / I pray you though it be your will
Note: For a different version of this legend see 150.
Subjects: Marina, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Marina — in couplets, ending with a six-line stanza, aabccb

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Herkeþ hideward ant beoþ stilley preie ou ȝof hit be
                    or wille…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…þou haue merci of mefor loue of þine
                    childe
